clumpy.load_transition_matrix¶

clumpy.load_transition_matrix(path, palette)[source]¶

Load transition matrixes according to a given palette.

Parameters

path (str) – Transition matrix file path.

Returns

tm – The loaded transition matrix.

Return type

TransitionMatrix
